layout.value:
__lv_expr__:{HorizontalLayout}:lively.morphic:new HorizontalLayout({
  align: "center",
  autoResize: true,
  direction: "leftToRight",
  orderByIndex: true,
  padding: {
    height: 0,
    width: 0,
    x: 0,
    y: 0
  },
  reactToSubmorphAnimations: false,
  renderViaCSS: true,
  resizeSubmorphs: false,
  spacing: 0
})

__lv_expr__:{VerticalLayout}:lively.morphic:new VerticalLayout({
  align: "center",
  autoResize: false,
  axis: "column",
  axisAlign: "center",
  direction: "centered",
  hugContentsHorizontally: false,
  hugContentsVertically: false,
  orderByIndex: true,
  padding: {
    height: 0,
    width: 0,
    x: 0,
    y: 0
  },
  reactToSubmorphAnimations: false,
  renderViaCSS: true,
  resizePolicies: [["aLabel", {
        height: "fixed",
        width: "fixed"
      }]],
  resizeSubmorphs: false,
  spacing: 0,
  wrapSubmorphs: false
})
